item.description: 出问题时的配置 数据结构的源码是GBK编码，vscode右下角可以改文件编码为GBK vscode终端选择powershell: Ctrl+Shift+p search Select Deafult profile 输入c

item.title: Docker-getting-started
item.author: 作者
item.description: Get started tutorial 啥是docker is a runnable instance of an image. You can create, start, stop, move, or delete a container using the DockerAPI or CLI（命令行界面）. can be run on local machines, virtual machines or deployed to the cloud. is portable (can be run on any OS) Containers are isolated from each other

item.title: 睡觉
item.author: 作者
item.description: 入眠方法 提示 遇到难题睡大觉 什么玩意睡眠法我忘了 将身体全方位的放松，包括头皮、眉毛、舌头 有规律的缓慢的深呼吸，吸气和憋气各4秒 眼睛在眼窝中随意
